title: Blue Sushi Sake Grill
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant chain in several US states. Uses vegan mayo and vegan tempura batter. On the regular menu all vegan items are marked with a 'v' and a separate menu for gluten-free items is available. Appetizers include edamame, shishito peppers, edamame hummus and veggies, seaweed salad, and miso soup. From the rest of the menu there are around 15 vegan choices and you can substitute brown rice for white rice. Wi-fi.
